Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ A group of people are buzzing on Twitter about the rising costs of Australian Parliament building renovations with the final tally surpassing a whopping $90 million from an initial $22 million estimate. The people are calling out the broken gas tax system in Australia as some multinational corporations aren't contributing their fair share. The same people keep sharing a mysterious shortened link but as it provides no useful details it's a mystery as to what's behind it.
